name: Navisworks File Set
summary: Learn about .NWF files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: An NWF can be published to an .NWD file, which stores all project assets in a standalone document for review. Choose File â†’ Publish from the Navisworks Manage application menu.

description: CAD project file created by Navisworks, a software package used for engineering design review; saves references to project asset CAD files (such as .DWG files) which make up the file set; used for storing collections of working files together.
